address: Xã Má Lé, Huyện Đồng Văn, Tỉnh Hà Giang
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Má Lé, Huyện Đồng Văn, Tỉnh Hà Giang"**

Okay, so I've been given an old address, "Xã Má Lé, Huyện Đồng Văn, Tỉnh Hà Giang," and I need to determine its new administrative unit. My process is pretty straightforward, leveraging my knowledge of these types of transformations.

First, I identified the old province, "Tỉnh Hà Giang."  Knowing that these administrative changes often involve province mergers, I immediately checked for relevant resolutions, specifically those related to Resolution 60-NQ/TW. Bingo! The resolution indicated a merger, forming "Tỉnh Tuyên Quang" from "Tỉnh Hà Giang." This is the key piece of context.

Next, I focused on identifying the specific old ward, "Xã Má Lé," within the old district of Huyện Đồng Văn. Knowing that wards can be reconfigured even across district boundaries within the same province, I searched for any resolutions that mentioned either "Xã Má Lé" or "Đồng Văn." My search led me to Resolution 1684/NQ-UBTVQH15, a resolution focused on administrative restructuring in Tỉnh Tuyên Quang.  And there it was, line 44:  "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Má Lé, Lũng Táo và Lũng Cú thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Lũng Cú**."  This directly stated that "Xã Má Lé" was merged into the new ward, "Xã Lũng Cú." Perfect!  The resolution's scope also fits the new province, Tỉnh Tuyên Quang, making it a solid match.

I also noted that the same resolution mentions the formation of a new "Xã Đồng Văn," but that's from a different set of old entities. Since "Xã Má Lé" had already been accounted for, I can safely set that aside for now.

Now, to solidify this, I'll need to double-check the "New wards" data, just to be thorough and verify codes. I found "{"ward_code":"00715","ward_name":"Xã Lũng Cú","province_name":"Tỉnh Tuyên Quang"}" confirming "Xã Lũng Cú" in "Tỉnh Tuyên Quang."  Also, confirming "{"ward_code":"00721","ward_name":"Xã Đồng Văn","province_name":"Tỉnh Tuyên Quang"}" exists, but that doesn't change the fact that Má Lé goes to Lũng Cú.

Based on this clear mapping and specific resolution, my confidence level is high. The JSON output will be straightforward, pointing to the specific line in Resolution 1684/NQ-UBTVQH15, citing "Xã Má Lé" being merged into "Xã Lũng Cú," with the correct province and ward information. That's a wrap!

citation.header: 1684/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Tuyên Quang
citation.line: 44. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Má Lé, Lũng Táo và Lũng Cú thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Lũng Cú.
